name: A Link to Love
description:
Pamela Sunrise has sent you a link to a video with a hefty price tag. Will you make her happy and click it?

-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-

A LINK TO LOVE is a work of interactive fiction set in the slightly-distant future in a town where nothing is quite what it seems. 

You play as a person without $100,000, who one day receives a link to a video from notorious online celebrity Pamela Sunrise, which happens to cost $100,000 to unlock. You play as a person who, if they were to click that link, would surely face certain hardships. 

But then again, you are very lonely. I mean, this is a video from the one and only Pamela Sunrise we're talking about here.  And maybe, just maybe, this link could be more than a link to a video. Maybe, just maybe, it could, in fact, be...

A LINK TO LOVE?

-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-_-

Team AYE:

  • Narrative & Game Design - Jimmy Pember | entrylevelgames#1462
  • Music & Sound Design - Jesse Forgione | Yampy#1994 (she/her)
  • Art & Graphics - Ash Ketchup | @meashketchup
